select c.counselor_id, u.real_name, u.avatar_url, c.expertise, c.rating, case when c.current_sessions = 5 then false else true end as is_free from counselors c inner join users u on c.counselor_id = u.user_id
and u.real_name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
and c.current_sessions = 5
and c.current_sessions < 5
order by c.rating desc
select c.counselor_id, u.real_name, case when c.current_sessions = 5 then false else true end as is_free from counselors c inner join users u on c.counselor_id = u.user_id where u.status = 'active'

select c.counselor_id, u.real_name as counselorName, c.rating, r.supervisor_id from counselors c inner join users u on c.counselor_id = u.user_id left outer join counselor_supervisor_relation r on c.counselor_id = r.counselor_id
and u.real_name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
